about.title: Caring From the Heart,
about.description: Exceptional care isn't loud‚Äîit's consistent. At Averon Healthcare LLC, we deliver refined, dependable in-home care with heart, respect, and intention. Every detail is handled with care so families can feel confident and at ease. Proudly serving Denton County, including Little Elm, Denton, Aubrey, Celina, Prosper, and Frisco, we help clients remain comfortable, independent, and supported‚Äîright where they belong.

services.title: Comprehensive Care Services
services.subtitle: At Averon Healthcare LLC, we provide dependable, compassionate home care designed around each client's individual needs. Our personalized approach supports comfort, safety, and independence in the place clients know best‚Äîhome. With experienced caregivers focused on quality and respect, we build trusted relationships that give families confidence and peace of mind every day.

serviceCards.title: Personal Care Services
serviceCards.description: Dignified assistance for daily living activities. We assist with bathing, dressing, grooming, mobility transfers, toileting, incontinence care, and medication reminders.
serviceCards.learnMore: Learn more about personal care services

serviceCards.title: Companion Care
serviceCards.description: Building connections and combating loneliness. Friendly conversations, meal preparation, light housekeeping, errands, and recreational activities.

serviceCards.title: Respite Care
serviceCards.description: Support for family caregivers when they need it most. Flexible scheduling, reliable caregivers, and peace of mind while you rest and recharge.

serviceCards.title: In-Facility Care
serviceCards.description: Supplemental care for residents in assisted living or skilled nursing facilities. One-on-one companionship, advocacy, and personalized attention.

serviceCards.title: Specialized Care
serviceCards.description: Expert support for chronic and cognitive conditions including Alzheimer's, dementia, Parkinson's disease, and post-surgery recovery care.

serviceCards.title: End-of-Life Care
serviceCards.description: Comfort and compassion during life's final journey. Pain management, emotional support, and assistance with daily needs for peace and dignity.

ctaSection.title: Schedule Your Free In-Home Care Assessment Today!
ctaSection.description: Discover how we can help your loved one live independently and comfortably at home. Call us at 800-385-5157 or email us at john.ovuera@averon.care to get started.

testimonials.title: What Families Say
testimonials.subtitle: Read stories from families who have experienced the Averon Healthcare LLC difference.

testimonials.feedback: Averon Healthcare has been incredible with my mom who has dementia. The caregiver is patient, calm, and knows how to redirect her when she's confused. It's made a huge difference for our family.
testimonials.name: Maria L.

testimonials.feedback: After my dad's stroke, we needed reliable help at home. Averon provided consistent care and support that helped him feel safe and regain confidence with daily routines.
testimonials.name: James R.

testimonials.feedback: My father has mobility issues and needs help with personal care. Averon's caregivers are respectful, professional, and treat him with real dignity.
testimonials.name: Angela P.

testimonials.feedback: We use Averon for respite care while caring for my wife, who has early Alzheimer's. Knowing she's in good hands gives me the break I need without worry.
testimonials.name: Robert T.

testimonials.feedback: Averon Healthcare has been amazing with my husband who has Parkinson's. The caregiver is attentive, patient, and truly understands his daily needs. Their consistency has brought stability and comfort to our home..
testimonials.name: Linda M.

testimonials.feedback: We hired Averon Healthcare to help care for my grandmother who has advanced arthritis and needs daily assistance. The caregivers are gentle, reliable, and treat her with so much respect. We couldn't be happier with the care.
testimonials.name: Tina K.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our home care services and how we can help your family.

questions.question: What home care services does Averon Healthcare LLC provide?
questions.answer: We offer comprehensive home care services including Personal Care Services, Companion Care, Respite Care, In-Facility Care, Specialized Care (Alzheimer's & Dementia, Parkinson's, Post-Surgery), and End-of-Life Care. All services are provided by certified, background-checked caregivers.

questions.question: What areas do you serve?
questions.answer: We proudly serve Little Elm, Denton, Aubrey, Celina, Prosper, Frisco in Denton County, TX. Our goal is to bring professional home care services directly to your doorstep throughout Denton County.

questions.question: Are your caregivers licensed and insured?
questions.answer: Yes, all our caregivers are certified in home care services, thoroughly background-checked, and bonded. Averon Healthcare LLC is fully licensed and insured to provide peace of mind for you and your family.

questions.question: How do you create personalized care plans?
questions.answer: We start with a comprehensive assessment of your needs, preferences, and health conditions. Our team then develops a customized care plan that addresses specific requirements while maintaining dignity and independence.

questions.question: What are your rates and do you accept insurance?
questions.answer: Our rates vary depending on the type and level of care needed. We accept long-term care insurance, private pay (using Visa/Mastercard/Discover), and work with families to explore all payment options to ensure you receive the care you need. Contact us for a free consultation to discuss pricing and payment options.

questions.question: What are your business hours?
questions.answer: Our business hours are 8 AM to 5 PM, Monday to Friday; 9 AM to 5 PM Saturday & closed on Sunday.

questions.question: Can I meet the caregiver before services begin?
questions.answer: Absolutely! We believe in the importance of compatibility and trust. We'll arrange for you to meet potential caregivers before services begin to ensure the best possible match for your family's needs.

questions.question: What if I'm not satisfied with the caregiver?
questions.answer: Your satisfaction is our priority. If you're not completely satisfied with your caregiver, we'll work with you to address concerns and, if necessary, provide a replacement caregiver at no additional cost.

ctaSection.title: Still have questions?
ctaSection.description: Our team is here to help. Contact us for a free consultation.
